jsonMessage: {"runs":[{"text":"謝謝老大響應毛寶貝公益，讓很多毛寶貝順利找到溫暖的家，也祝福老大耶誕快樂","bold":false,"italics":false,"strikethrough":false},{"text":"🥰","emoji":{"emoji_id":"🥰","shortcuts":[":smiling_face_with_hearts:"],"search_terms":["smiling","face","with","hearts"],"image":[{"url":"https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/e/notoemoji/15.1/1f970/72.png"}],"is_custom":false}},{"text":"💖","emoji":{"emoji_id":"💖","shortcuts":[":sparkling_heart:"],"search_terms":["sparkling","heart"],"image":[{"url":"https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/e/notoemoji/15.1/1f496/72.png"}],"is_custom":false}}],"text":"謝謝老大響應毛寶貝公益，讓很多毛寶貝順利找到溫暖的家，也祝福老大耶誕快樂🥰💖"}
